name: Peel Away速 ST-1
description: Peel Away速 ST-1 Steel Structures Paint Remover is specially formulated to be the ultimate cost-effective paint remover used to remove the toughest pre-1980 based paints and coatings from steel structures, such as bridges, tanks, structural support members, water towers, steel buildings, and many more! Unlike other Peel Away速 Paint Removers, Peel Away ST-1 does not require the use of Dumond速 Laminated Paper. This feature ensures a swift and easy application to hard-to-reach and potentially dangerous application locations. Peel Away ST-1 does not contain the harmful chemicals methylene chloride or NMP.
